title: Trump-Epstein Relationship & Files Controversy
summary: Decades-long friendship with Jeffrey Epstein, with released emails showing Epstein wrote Trump 'knew about the girls.' Trump administration initially fought release of DOJ files before judge ordered it.
keyFacts: 2002 Trump quote: 'I've known Jeff for fifteen years. Terrific guy... many of them are on the younger side'
Flight logs show Trump flew on Epstein's plane at least 7 times (1993-1997)
January 2025: Trump administration fought release of remaining DOJ Epstein files
Federal judge ordered release over administration objections
Epstein's emails showed Epstein wrote Trump 'knew about the girls' and 'spent hours at my house'
Another email: Epstein claimed Trump was 'interested in [victim's name redacted] but she was too old for him'
Trump's own Attorney General (Bondi) confirmed authenticity of emails to Congress
Trump appointed Alexander Acosta as Labor Secretary - the prosecutor who gave Epstein controversial sweetheart plea deal in 2008
